scripts.install:latest: npm install --save-dev typings@* typescript@* istanbul@* jasmine@*
scripts.init: rm -rf .git && npm run install:latest && npm init && git init
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:tsc
scripts.prepack: npm run build && cp -r src/typedef build/src/ && cp package.json build && cp typings.json build && cp README.md build
scripts.test: rm -rf build && npm run build:tsc && istanbul cover jasmine
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run prepack && npm publish build
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run prepack && npm publish build
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run prepack && npm publish build
